title: The Salvatore Marriage Deal
description: The ruthless Italian tycoon and his pregnant mistressâ€¦Powerful and arrogant, Vito Salvatore thinks Lily Chase is different from the women he normally beds. But when she tells him she's pregnant, he calls her a gold digger and throws her out!A marriage by arrangement!But now Vito needs a Salvatore heir. So he'll take Lily as his convenient bride!
author: Natalie Rivers
